comment: We shouldn't hold Kaitlan's past tweets calling people "fags" in college against her. She was young and ignorant. I mean, she didn't even know the difference between Republicans and Democrats until CNN hired her last year.
amr:
# ::snt We shouldn't hold Kaitlan's past tweets calling people "fags" in college against her. She was young and ignorant. I mean, she didn't even know the difference between Republicans and Democrats until CNN hired her last year.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / recommend-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (h / hold-04
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (t / tweet-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Kaitlan"))
                        :time (p2 / past)
                        :ARG0-of (c / call-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person)
                              :ARG2 (f / fag)
                              :time (c2 / college)))
                  :prep-against p))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (y / young
                  :domain p)
            :op2 (ii / ignorant-02
                  :ARG1 p))
      :snt3 (m2 / mean-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG2 (k / know-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (s / she)
                  :ARG1 (d / differ-02
                        :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Republican"))
                        :ARG2 (p5 / political-party
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Democrat")))
                  :mod (e / even)
                  :time (u / until
                        :op1 (h2 / hire-01
                              :ARG0 (p6 / publication
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "CNN"))
                              :ARG1 s
                              :time (y2 / year
                                    :mod (l / last)))))))

comment: Whoa whoa, homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thanks
amr:

      :snt1 (w / whoa
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (h / homophobia)))
            :op2 (h2 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 s)))
      :snt3 (r2 / refrain-01

            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :mod (t / type
                        :mod (t2 / this))))
      :snt4 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 y))
